name: Ashish Yadav
goal: To become an industry-focused Data Scientist and AI Engineer who delivers business-driven solutions.
summary: Ashish Yadav is a BCA student passionate about Data Science, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Business Intelligence. He has built multiple real-world projects across ML, AI, Power BI, SQL, Python, Excel, and Web Development.

projects.name: Laptop Price Prediction
projects.problem: Laptop prices vary based on specifications and brands.
projects.solution: Built a regression-based ML model using laptop specifications.
projects.outcome: Accurate price prediction and feature importance insights.

projects.name: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.problem: Businesses lose customers without knowing churn reasons.
projects.solution: Developed a churn prediction classification model.

projects.name: Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.solution: Trained ML models to detect abnormal transactions.

projects.name: Heart Disease Prediction
projects.problem: Early heart disease detection is critical.
projects.solution: Built ML models using medical attributes.

projects.name: Face Mask Detection
projects.solution: Developed a CNN-based real-time detection system.

projects.name: Emotion-Based Music Recommendation
projects.solution: Used facial emotion detection to recommend songs.

projects.name: Power BI Dashboards
projects.problem: Raw data is difficult to interpret.
projects.solution: Designed interactive dashboards for business insights.

projects.name: Zomato Data Analysis
projects.problem: Understanding food ordering behavior is complex.

projects.name: Zepto Data Analysis
projects.solution: Analyzed order data using SQL queries.
